alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:00PM CDT until April 20 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR KAUFMAN AND WESTERN VAN ZANDT COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kaufman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Terrell, Kaufman, Wills Point, Mabank, Crandall, Talty, Kemp, Grays Prairie, Purtis Creek State Park, New Terrell City Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Myrtle Springs, Elmo, Scurry, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Oak Ridge, Whitton, Ola and Alsa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
